manual_select_menu.description_select_menu:
Description :

1. This nutrition screening form uses weight and height data to calculate the mass index. body (BMI) and data from patient history taking By specifying only 'yes' or 'no' answers.

2. This screening form does not save or store information that You fill out and screening results if you want. Screening results, please download or print after each screening.

assessment_page_start.description_page_start: Description : To make a screening Nutritional Status Assessment Model Information is required. /n - Weight /n - Height A section to use to calculate your body mass index (BMI) and have questions for you to do. Answer by choosing to answer in 2 cases, yes and no.

warning_page_start.description_warning_page_start: Would you like to leave the rating page? If you agree to leave the assessment Everything you do in this assessment will be deleted.

assesment_page.description_assesment_weight_loss: The patient had an unintentional weight loss in During the past 6 months?
assesment_page.description_assesment_Patients_were_fed_: Patients were fed less than they used to (> 7 days).
assesment_page.description_patients_with_critical: Patients with critical illness or semi-crisis .or not

screening_results.description_continue_assess: Your screening result is /n- Continue the nutritional assessment. or consult a dietitian / nutrition team
screening_results.description_repeat: Your screening result is /n- The screening should be repeated once a week. during the hospital stay
